thread.title: Pooja Gandhi supports threatned director
thread.title_full: Pooja Gandhi supports threatned director - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pooja Gandhi supports threatned director
text:
When Chetana Thirathalli went to the Hanumanthanagar Police Station to lodge a complaint against the fundamentalists who have been threatening her with her life online, she had the support of actress Pooja Gandhi. Chetana is the associate director and script writer of Pooja Gandhi's Raavani.
Chetana told Bangalore Times that when Pooja heard about her ordeal, the actress left everything that she was doing and accompanied her to the police station. She then spent several hours with Chetana and assured her of her support.
Here's the picture that Chetana posted on her Facebook page which shows Pooja with her outside the Hanumanthanagar Police Station:
